x-codeSamples.source:
import requests
import json

url = "https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v2/wms/order"

payload = json.dumps({
  "ShipTo": {
    "Name": "Johnson Orthodontics",
    "Street": "18947 John J Williams Hwy Unit 310",
    "Street2": "",
    "Street3": "",
    "City": "Rehoboth Beach",
    "State": "DE",
    "Phone": "3026455554",
    "Attention": "Dr. Jonathan Johnson",
    "Zipcode": "19971",
    "CountryCode": "US"
  },
  "BillTo": {
    "Name": "Johnson Orthodontics",
    "Street": "18947 John J Williams Hwy Unit 310",
    "Street2": "",
    "Street3": "",
    "City": "Rehoboth Beach",
    "State": "DE",
    "Phone": "3026455554",
    "Attention": "Dr. Jonathan Johnson",
    "Zipcode": "19971",
    "CountryCode": "US"
  },
  "LineItem": [
    {
      "StockCode": "FGI",
      "PartNumber": "RS-F2-DRGR-02",
      "Line": "1",
      "Quantity": "3",
      "Price": "149.00",
      "Description": ""
    }
  ],
  "CustomerReference": "IF474579A",
  "PONumber": "",
  "FreightTerms": "DAP",
  "Forwarder": "UPS",
  "ShipDate":"2022-08-23",
  "Currency": "USD",
  "ShippingNotes": "",
  "ShippingMethod": "Ground",
  "LocationId": "PHL",
  "ForwarderAccount": "",
  "SONumber": "US-007203173"
})
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'x-api-key': '<X-API-KEY>'
}

response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers, data=payload)

print(response.text)

curl --location 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v2/wms/order' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>' \
--data '{
    "ShipTo": {
        "Name": "Johnson Orthodontics",
        "Street": "18947 John J Williams Hwy Unit 310",
        "Street2": "",
        "Street3": "",
        "City": "Rehoboth Beach",
        "State": "DE",
        "Phone": "3026455554",
        "Attention": "Dr. Jonathan Johnson",
        "Zipcode": "19971",
        "CountryCode": "US"
    },
    "BillTo": {
        "Name": "Johnson Orthodontics",
        "Street": "18947 John J Williams Hwy Unit 310",
        "Street2": "",
        "Street3": "",
        "City": "Rehoboth Beach",
        "State": "DE",
        "Phone": "3026455554",
        "Attention": "Dr. Jonathan Johnson",
        "Zipcode": "19971",
        "CountryCode": "US"
    },
    "LineItem": [
        {
            "StockCode": "FGI",
            "PartNumber": "RS-F2-DRGR-02",
            "Line": "1",
            "Quantity": "3",
            "Price": "149.00",
            "Description": ""
        }
    ],
    "CustomerReference": "IF474579A",
    "PONumber": "",
    "FreightTerms": "DAP",
    "Forwarder": "UPS",
    "ShipDate": "2022-08-23",
    "Currency": "USD",
    "ShippingNotes": "",
    "ShippingMethod": "Ground",
    "LocationId": "PHL",
    "ForwarderAccount": "",
    "SONumber": "US-007203173"
}'

curl --location 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v2/wms/orderstatus?dateFrom=2023-10-22T01:30:00-05:00&dateTo=2023-11-24T20:00:00-05:00' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>'

curl --location 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v2/wms/receipt?dateFrom=2023-03-20T11%3A00%3A00&dateTo=2023-04-21T21%3A20%3A00' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>'

curl --location 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v2/wms/adjustment?dateFrom=2023-04-05T11%3A17%3A00Z&dateTo=2023-04-08T21%3A18%3A00Z' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>'

import requests
import json

url = "https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v2/shipment/create"

payload = json.dumps({
  "shipmentCreateRequest": {
    "serviceLevel": "EC",
    "readyTime": "2023-06-30T09:00:00Z",
    "closeTime": "2023-06-30T17:00:00Z",
    "insuredValue": 1234.56,
    "mode": "DOM",
    "incoterm": "EXW",
    "billTo": "3",
    "specialInstructions": "DRIVER WILL NEED PALLET WRAP",
    "shipper": {
      "name": "Test Shipper Inc.",
      "address": "2423 PLEASANT RD",
      "address2": "",
      "city": "Someplace",
      "state": "GA",
      "zip": "31234",
      "country": "US",
      "contact": "Test Person",
      "phone": "8135551514",
      "email": "test@gmail.com"
    },
    "consignee": {
      "name": "Anonyco",
      "address": "651 W 57th St",
      "address2": "",
      "city": "New New York",
      "state": "NY",
      "zip": "10019",
      "country": "US",
      "contact": "B. Rodriguez",
      "phone": "2125552254",
      "email": "matt@planetexpress.us"
    },
    "shipmentLines": [
      {
        "description": "EQUIPMENT",
        "pieces": 4,
        "pieceType": "PCE",
        "weight": 15,
        "weightUOM": "LB",
        "length": 12,
        "width": 15,
        "height": 10,
        "dimUOM": "IN",
        "hazmat": False
      }
    ],
    "customerReference": [
      {
        "refParty": "Shipper",
        "refType": "PO",
        "refNumber": "ABC123"
      },
      {
        "refParty": "BillTo",
        "refType": "REF",
        "refNumber": "DEF456"
      }
    ],
    "accessorialList": [
      "PALL",
      "SHRNK"
    ]
  }
})
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'x-api-key': '<X-API-KEY>'
}

response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers, data=payload)

print(response.text)

curl --location 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v2/shipment/create' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>' \
--data-raw '{
  "shipmentCreateRequest": {
    "serviceLevel": "EC",
    "readyTime": "2023-06-30T09:00:00Z",
    "closeTime": "2023-06-30T17:00:00Z",
    "insuredValue": 1234.56,
    "mode": "DOM",
    "incoterm": "EXW",
    "billTo": "3",
    "specialInstructions": "DRIVER WILL NEED PALLET WRAP",
    "shipper": {
      "name": "Test Shipper Inc.",
      "address": "2423 PLEASANT RD",
      "address2": "",
      "city": "Someplace",
      "state": "GA",
      "zip": "31234",
      "country": "US",
      "contact": "Test Person",
      "phone": "8135551514",
      "email": "test@gmail.com"
    },
    "consignee": {
      "name": "Anonyco",
      "address": "651 W 57th St",
      "address2": "",
      "city": "New New York",
      "state": "NY",
      "zip": "10019",
      "country": "US",
      "contact": "B. Rodriguez",
      "phone": "2125552254",
      "email": "matt@planetexpress.us"
    },
    "shipmentLines": [
      {
        "description": "EQUIPMENT",
        "pieces": 4,
        "pieceType": "PCE",
        "weight": 15,
        "weightUOM": "LB",
        "length": 12,
        "width": 15,
        "height": 10,
        "dimUOM": "IN",
        "hazmat": false
      }
    ],
    "customerReference": [
      {
        "refParty": "Shipper",
        "refType": "PO",
        "refNumber": "ABC123"
      },
      {
        "refParty": "BillTo",
        "refType": "REF",
        "refNumber": "DEF456"
      }
    ],
    "accessorialList": [
      "PALL",
      "SHRNK"
    ]
  }
}'

curl --location 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v2/shipment/rate' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>' \
--data '{
        "shipmentRateRequest": {
            "pickupTime": "2023-11-11T17:00:00",
            "shipperZip": "40118",
            "consigneeZip": "60502",
            "shipmentLines": [
                {
                    "pieces": 3,
                    "pieceType": "PCE",
                    "weight": 225,
                    "weightUOM": "lb",
                    "length": 20,
                    "width": 20,
                    "height": 30,
                    "dimUOM": "in",
                    "hazmat": false
                }
            ],
            "accessorialList": []
        }
    }'

curl --location 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v2/shipment/getdocument?housebill=SAT5810973-00&docType=BI' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>'

curl --location --request GET 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v2/shipment/detail?housebill=327962' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>'

ApiKeyAuth.description: For this sample, you can use the api key `x-api-key` to test the authorization filters.
ApiKeyAuth.name: x-api-key
